description: National security definition phrases that are predictive of successful sealing motions
chroma_query_template: national security definition matter of national security {case_context}

recommendations.critical: Include explicit national security definition phrases to establish the legal foundation.
recommendations.rationale: CatBoost analysis shows NS definition phrases are predictive of successful sealing motions (importance: 3.67).
recommendations.insight: Successful motions explicitly define the case as a 'matter of national security' or invoke 'national security interests'.

suggestions: Use phrases like 'matter of national security' or 'national security interest'
Include at least 2-3 different NS definition phrases
Place NS definitions in Introduction or Legal Standard section
